title: Far Sector
description: For the past six months, newly chosen Green Lantern Sojourner “Jo” Mullein has been protecting The City Enduring, a massive metropolis of 20 billion people. The city has maintained peace for over 500 years by stripping its citizens of their ability to feel. As a result, violent crime is virtually unheard of, and murder is nonexistent. Until now.
author: N.K. Jemison
